title: The Wraith
description:
Teresa can see dead people. And she’s not afraid… until she meets HER.

Season 2 Episode 1

itunes:subtitle: As a kid, Teresa could see dead people. Family members, friends. Until one day, she met a stranger who had come back from the other side with a message for her. Teresa Moorleghen is the founder of Coastline Pilates in Santa Cruz. She still sees dead peop
